name: Arcubed
description:
WARNING: FLASHING LIGHTS!

Arcubed is a remake of Dallen's Game. It is very basic containing no music and lacks a lot of polish. This was released to preserve Dallen's Original Game. If there is an interest a more polished version of this will get made.

Controls

  • Move The Arcube - A/D

Credits

  • Dallen Larson - Creator
